row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.PROMPTSET.QUERY_ENTITY
row.description: Ask for the query entity details

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="552"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Enter Entity Resource For Query Text"><properties><entry name="text">Enter Entity Resource For Query Text</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>
